Reviews.Title: “The very worst I have stayed in Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: SennamanUK
Reviews.Content: booked minute trip amsterdam wife cheap clean hotel location fair ain location thats pit totally refurbished reception actually stair amsterdam hotels loads people hours night coming complained basically tough checked stayed 50 meters road tatty cramped dirty disrepair recommend bench squares stay peril

Reviews.Title: “very very bad!!!”
Reviews.Author: joanie86
Reviews.Content: arived hotel shocked building completly renovated fit living windows boarded looked terrible look building windows woud building laying floor looked entrance luck found accomodation elsewhere 3 days realised charged night hotel inconvenience arriving check booked online apparently didnt look stayed anyway location rest terrible

Reviews.Title: “All you'll find is an empty building!!!”
Reviews.Author: NottinghamToffee
Reviews.Content: booked august trip correspondence hotel closed imagine shock arrived confronted building sale shell advice youve mistake internet lovely hotel wander street book apartment thankfully found staff wonderful sorted accommodation minutes apartment clean cosy cheaper damrak
